item.title: Automatically Delete Old Pa11y Results From MongoDB
item.description: You’ve probably already noticed that Pa11y-Dashboard runs all the tasks on a daily basis. If you have a lot of tasks (e.g. 100+) then the test results can fairly quickly gobble up your MongoDB quota (if you have any). If your MongoDB has a size limit defined, then you can do two things: manually delete old test results or use TTL Index to do it for you automagically MongoDB supports TTL indexes since v2.
